name: TITAN 3 [2023]
description:
the third game in my Titan-3d series of games

_____________________________________________________________________________________

Gameplay:

-Kill dozens of enemies (zombies, soldiers)

-Giant open world levels with puzzles (find the key in each level to progress the game)

-Newer, better 3D Graphics and new game engine

-Better Animated 3D effects and animations

- 10 new guns to kill things with, new collectables and score system

___________________________________________________________________________________

The game will be fully released and finished by January 2023

Windows PC Requirements

Minimum:

  • OS: 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

Recommended:

  • OS: 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
